## UserAuthenticationChangeEvent type

UserAuthenticationChangeEvent.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UserAuthenticationChangeEvent = CustomEvent<boolean>;
```

## Remarks

Detail will either be `true` or `false` to indicate authentication status.
